Title: Grot Rock Lobber
Intro: A Grot Rock Lobber is armed with Big Rocks.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: A Grot Rock Lobber has a crew of 3 Grots and 1 Orruk Bully, who are armed with Slittas. The crew must remain within l" of the Grot Rock Lobber. For rules purposes, the Grot Rock Lobber and its crew are treated as a single model.

Rules.Name: Flatten The Lot Of ’Em
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESFlatten the Lot of ’Em: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with a Big Rock that target a unit with more than 5 models.
